no	,	it	was	n't	black	monday	.

but	while	the	new	york	stock	exchange	did	n't	fall	apart	friday	as	the	dow	jones	industrial	average	plunged	<num>	points	--	most	of	it	in	the	final	hour	--	it	barely	managed	to	stay	this	side	of	chaos	.

selling	snowballed	because	of	waves	of	automatic	``	stop-loss	''	orders	,	which	are	triggered	by	computer	when	prices	fall	to	certain	levels	.

now	,	at	3:07	,	one	of	the	market	's	post-crash	``	reforms	''	took	hold	as	the	s&p	<num>	futures	contract	had	plunged	<num>	points	,	equivalent	to	around	a	100-point	drop	in	the	dow	industrials	.
R	,	I	C	,	C	I	D	N	P	J	`	N	'	V	N	I	D	N	C	N	N	V	V	C	N	,	J	T	R	D	J	N	I	D	N	N	.

under	an	agreement	signed	by	the	big	board	and	the	chicago	mercantile	exchange	,	trading	was	temporarily	halted	in	chicago	.
I	D	N	V	I	D	N	N	C	D	N	N	N	,	N	V	R	V	I	N	.
PP	DEP	NP	VP	PP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP	DEP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	ADVP	VP	PP	NP	DEP
16	3	1	3	4	8	8	13	13	13	13	13	5	4	16	0	18	16	18	19	16

after	the	trading	halt	in	the	s&p	<num>	pit	in	chicago	,	waves	of	selling	continued	to	hit	stocks	themselves	on	the	big	board	,	and	specialists	continued	to	notch	prices	down	.
I	D	N	N	I	D	N	C	N	I	N	,	N	I	V	V	T	V	N	P	I	D	N	N	,	C	N	V	T	V	N	R	.
PP	DEP	DEP	NP	PP	DEP	DEP	DEP	NP	PP	NP	DEP	NP	PP	S	VP	DEP	S	NP-OBJ	NP-OBJ	PP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	DEP	S	NP-OBJ	ADVP	DEP
21	4	4	1	4	9	9	9	5	9	10	11	10	13	14	15	18	16	18	19	28	24	24	21	28	27	28	0	30	28	30	30	28

as	a	result	,	the	link	between	the	futures	and	stock	markets	ripped	apart	.
I	D	N	,	D	N	I	D	N	C	N	N	V	R	.
PP	DEP	NP	DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	PP	DEP	NP	DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	ADVP	DEP
13	3	1	13	6	13	6	9	7	12	12	13	0	13	13

without	the	guidepost	of	stock-index	futures	--	the	barometer	of	where	traders	think	the	overall	stock	market	is	headed	--	many	traders	were	afraid	to	trust	stock	prices	quoted	on	the	big	board	.
I	D	N	I	N	N	:	D	N	I	W	N	V	D	J	N	N	V	V	:	J	N	V	J	T	V	N	N	V	I	D	N	N	.
PP	DEP	NP-SBJ	PP	DEP	NP	DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	PP	NP	NP	ROOT	DEP	DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	S	VP	DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	S	ADJP	DEP	S	DEP	NP-OBJ	S	PP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP
13	3	13	3	6	4	9	9	13	9	10	10	0	17	17	17	18	29	18	21	22	23	29	23	26	23	28	26	34	29	33	33	30	13

the	futures	halt	was	even	assailed	by	big	board	floor	traders	.
D	N	N	V	R	V	I	N	N	N	N	.
DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	ADVP	VP	PP	DEP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP
3	3	4	0	6	4	6	11	11	11	7	4

``	it	screwed	things	up	,	''	said	one	major	specialist	.
`	P	V	N	R	,	'	V	C	J	N	.
DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	NP-OBJ	PRT	DEP	DEP	PRN	DEP	DEP	NP-OBJ	DEP
3	3	0	3	3	11	11	11	11	11	3	3

this	confusion	effectively	halted	one	form	of	program	trading	,	stock	index	arbitrage	,	that	closely	links	the	futures	and	stock	markets	,	and	has	been	blamed	by	some	for	the	market	's	big	swings	.
D	N	R	V	C	N	I	N	N	,	N	N	N	,	W	R	V	D	N	C	N	N	,	C	V	V	V	I	D	I	D	N	P	J	N	.
DEP	NP-SBJ	ADVP	ROOT	DEP	NP-OBJ	PP	DEP	NP	DEP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP	SBAR	ADVP	S	DEP	NP	DEP	DEP	NP-OBJ	DEP	DEP	S	VP	VP	PP	NP	PP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP	NP	DEP
2	4	4	0	6	4	6	9	7	13	13	13	9	13	13	17	25	19	22	22	22	17	25	25	15	25	26	27	28	29	33	33	35	35	30	4

(	in	a	stock-index	arbitrage	sell	program	,	traders	buy	or	sell	big	baskets	of	stocks	and	offset	the	trade	in	futures	to	lock	in	a	price	difference	.	)
-	I	D	N	N	N	N	,	N	V	C	V	J	N	I	N	C	V	D	N	I	N	T	V	R	D	N	N	.	-
DEP	PP	DEP	DEP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	DEP	DEP	DEP	NP-OBJ	PP	NP	DEP	S	DEP	NP-OBJ	PP	NP	DEP	S	PRT	DEP	DEP	NP-OBJ	DEP	DEP
2	10	7	7	7	7	2	10	10	0	10	10	14	12	14	15	10	10	20	18	18	21	24	22	24	28	28	24	10	10

``	when	the	airline	information	came	through	,	it	cracked	every	model	we	had	for	the	marketplace	,	''	said	a	managing	director	at	one	of	the	largest	program-trading	firms	.
`	W	D	N	N	V	R	,	P	V	D	N	P	V	I	D	N	,	'	V	D	N	N	I	C	I	D	J	N	N	.

meanwhile	,	during	the	the	s&p	trading	halt	,	s&p	futures	sell	orders	began	piling	up	,	while	stocks	in	new	york	kept	falling	sharply	.

under	another	post-crash	system	,	big	board	president	richard	grasso	(	mr.	phelan	was	flying	to	bangkok	as	the	market	was	falling	)	was	talking	on	an	``	inter-exchange	hot	line	''	to	the	other	exchanges	,	the	securities	and	exchange	commission	and	the	federal	reserve	board	.

he	camped	out	at	a	high-tech	nerve	center	on	the	floor	of	the	big	board	,	where	he	could	watch	updates	on	prices	and	pending	stock	orders	.

but	the	build-up	of	s&p	futures	sell	orders	weighed	on	the	market	,	and	the	link	with	stocks	began	to	fray	again	.

during	this	time	,	small	investors	began	ringing	their	brokers	,	wondering	whether	another	crash	had	begun	.

but	there	were	no	buyers	.
C	E	V	D	N	.
DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	DEP	NP-OBJ	DEP
3	3	0	5	3	3

while	friday	's	debacle	involved	mainly	professional	traders	rather	than	investors	,	it	left	the	market	vulnerable	to	continued	selling	this	morning	,	traders	said	.
I	N	P	N	V	R	J	N	R	I	N	,	P	V	D	N	J	T	V	V	D	N	,	N	V	.
SBAR	DEP	NP	NP	VP	DEP	DEP	NP	DEP	PP	NP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	DEP	NP-OBJ	ADJP	PP	NP	S	DEP	NP-OBJ	DEP	NP-SBJ	DEP	DEP
14	3	4	8	4	7	8	9	10	14	10	14	14	0	16	14	16	17	18	19	22	20	14	25	23	14

stock-index	futures	contracts	settled	at	much	lower	prices	than	indexes	of	the	stock	market	itself	.
J	N	N	V	I	J	J	N	I	N	I	D	N	N	P	.
DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	PP	DEP	DEP	NP	PP	NP	PP	DEP	DEP	NP	NP-OBJ	DEP
3	3	4	0	4	8	8	5	8	9	10	14	14	11	14	4

at	those	levels	,	stocks	are	set	up	to	be	hammered	by	index	arbitragers	,	who	lock	in	profits	by	buying	futures	when	futures	prices	fall	,	and	simultaneously	sell	off	stocks	.
I	D	N	,	N	V	V	R	T	V	V	I	N	N	,	W	V	R	N	I	V	N	W	N	N	V	,	C	R	V	R	N	.
PP	DEP	NP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	VP	PRT	DEP	S	VP	PP	DEP	NP	DEP	SBAR	S	PRT	NP-OBJ	PP	S	NP-OBJ	DEP	DEP	NP-OBJ	S	DEP	DEP	ADVP	VP	PRT	NP-OBJ	DEP
6	3	1	6	6	0	6	7	10	6	10	11	14	12	14	14	16	17	17	17	20	21	25	25	21	20	30	30	30	26	30	30	6

but	nobody	knows	at	what	level	the	futures	and	stocks	will	open	today	.
C	N	V	I	W	V	D	N	C	N	M	V	N	.
DEP	NP-SBJ	S	PP	SBAR	S	DEP	DEP	DEP	NP-SBJ	ROOT	VP	NP-OBJ	DEP
11	3	11	3	4	5	10	10	10	11	0	11	12	11

the	de-linkage	between	the	stock	and	futures	markets	friday	will	undoubtedly	cause	renewed	debate	about	whether	wall	street	is	properly	prepared	for	another	crash	situation	.

stock-fund	sales	have	rebounded	in	recent	months	,	but	monthly	net	purchases	are	still	running	at	less	than	half	<num>	levels	.

peter	otradovec	,	vice	president	for	planning	at	the	phoenix	,	ariz.	,	carrier	,	said	in	an	interview	that	the	work	stoppage	at	boeing	,	now	entering	its	13th	day	,	``	has	caused	some	turmoil	in	our	scheduling	''	and	that	more	than	<num>	passengers	who	were	booked	to	fly	out	of	houston	on	america	west	would	now	be	put	on	other	airlines	.

2	5	5	5	16	5	6	5	10	8	14	14	14	8	5	0	16	19	17	16	23	23	20	23	24	23	28	20	31	31	28	45	45	33	34	37	35	35	40	38	45	45	44	45	47	45	31	47	48	49	52	50	52	53	54	52	58	56	56	59	59	61	62	65	63	16

mr.	otradovec	said	boeing	told	america	west	that	the	<num>	it	was	supposed	to	get	this	thursday	would	n't	be	delivered	until	nov.	<num>	--	the	day	after	the	airline	had	been	planning	to	initiate	service	at	houston	with	four	daily	flights	,	including	three	nonstops	to	phoenix	and	one	nonstop	to	las	vegas	.
